participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and adventurous, enjoys exploring new hobbies and experiences.
participant_1.background: I need to move because my convertible is not practical for driving to school. While both my parents have thick European accents, I do not. I also love drawing. A hobby of mine is the drums. I have four sisters.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Passionate and nurturing, with a strong sense of loyalty and a love for animals.
participant_2.background: I'm a loyal friend and I'm good with my money. I could move out, but she does not want me to. I met my husband at a dog park and we fell in love over our shared love of animals. I realized that losing my mind was the first step to winning. I am in art school.

content.text: I am currently in art school so I love to draw and paint.
that is really cool, how long have you been doing that?
I have been drawing and painting my whole life. My parents are both artists so I grew up in a very creative household.
that is really cool, i have always wanted to learn how to draw and paint.
you should totally try it! it is so much fun and relaxing.
yeah i might do that, i need a new hobby.
what do you do for fun now?
i like to go out to concerts and play drums.
oh that sounds fun, i love going to concerts!
yeah, i go to a lot of concerts. i love live music.
me too! what is your favorite band?
i really like the arctic monkeys.
oh nice, they are really good!
do you want to go to a concert with me sometime?
great! i will let you know when i find a good show.
